text: Arau yisakale beya kama karae, pratito beya kamara pratidana haâ€™ba se'i anupate'i arau hinata'i sihamtaka acchanna karaiba; allahara paraa sihamtaka raksa karaibalai kono na'i; sihamtara mukhamandala enekai andhakaraacchanna hai thakiba yeniba raatira andhakarara ararane sihamtaka chati dharaiche. Sihamte'i jahannamara adhibasi, tata sihamta cirasthayi haâ€™ba
